com.enhancedCanvas

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.enhancedCanvas.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Diamond, InvertTrapezoid, InvertTriangle, Parallelogram, Rectangle, Trapezoid, Triangle

    class Shape
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape

        Shape(int x,
      int y,
      int length,
      int height,
      boolean isLeft,
      boolean isVisible)
        The base constructor to store parameters in from the other shape classes. All classes extending this class follow this template.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate to start from.
        y - the y-coordinate to start from.
        length - how long the shape is to be (used as Circle's radius).
        height - how tall the shape is to be (unused in Circle, Diamond, Triangle, and InvertTriangle).
        isLeft - a flag to determine if the shape is to be slanted to the left (Parallelogram only).
        isVisible - a flag to determine if the shape is to be visible or not (default = true).
